SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT292
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is:
a) sent by a financial institution to request a second financial institution to consider cancellation of the SWIFT message identified in the request.
b) sent by a corporate customer to request a financial institution to consider cancellation of the SWIFT message identified in the request.
If the Receiver of the request for cancellation has already acted on the message for which cancellation is requested, the MT n92 asks for a retransfer, that is, reversal, with the beneficiary's consent.

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//'(Error code(s): T26).
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//'(Error code(s): T26).

Option.Name: S
Option.Description: MT and Date of the Original Message

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).

Option.Description: Narrative Description of the Original Message

CopyOfFields.Name: Copy Of Fields
CopyOfFields.Description: Copy of at least the Mandatory Fields of the Original Message

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: F11S
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In field 11S, MT Number must be a number in the range 100 - 999."

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Either field 79 or a copy of at least the mandatory fields of the original message must be present."

fieldvalidation.name: FCP
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Tags 77F, 77G, 77S or 77T cannot appear in Copy Of Fields."

fieldvalidation.name: ERI
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."
